name: Escape The Ship (Whatever)
description:
A short puzzle game where you control a human and a robot who work together to escape a spaceship that has been hit by an asteroid.  Work through each room aiming to press all the buttons to open the door to the next room. Escape or Die trying.

Controls

WASD - moves human

Mouse 1 -  moves robot

R - restart

Credits

Game by Alec Holden

Sound and Art by Jojo Holden

Music by Tobias Holden
